DOC.brief_summary: Comparison of two operative techniques (on-pump vs off-pump)of coronary revascularisation of the best treatment concept for patients older or 75 years old. Hypothesis: The coronary bypass operation without use of the heart-lung machine (off-pump=OPCAB) reduces the combined endpoint in comparison with the conventional coronary bypass operation (on-pump).
DOC.brief_title: German Off Pump Coronary Artery Bypass in Elderly Study
DOC.criteria: older or 75 years indication for elective bypass operation patient has signed written consent before randomization previous heart surgery patient unable to give informed consent
